resources.string:
This app demonstrates issues with AAC/Jetpack "Navigation" component

 * Overflow menu items do nothing
 To verify, open overflow menu and attempt to navigate using one of the items.

 * Buttons only work once To reproduce:
 - press one of the below buttons
 - from the desination screeen press the toolbar up button, or system back button
 - after returning to this screen, press the button again
 Expect that nothing will happen when either button pressed second and subsequent times

 Note: navigation via nav drawer items works repeatedly from app launch, even if buttons have stopped working
